physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Ataxic gait, confusion, and slurred speech noted after 2 months of hospitalization; increased confusion, disorientation, and ataxia after tapering medications.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially mild confusion and ataxia worsened over time despite medication adjustments. Improvement observed after reducing the dose of extended-release divalproex sodium.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Nonfunctioning islet cell carcinoma discovered during examination, normal serum levels of gastrin, insulin, and glucagon.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: High level of serum parathyroid hormone found three months post-partial pancreatectomy; psychiatric symptoms remained unalleviated.
